sentence.Network_en: The police checked all windows and doors for signs of forcible entry.
sentence.Network_cn: 警察检查了所有的门窗以寻找强行闯入的痕迹。

sentence.Network_en: Reports are coming in of the forcible resettlement of villagers from the countryside into towns.
sentence.Network_cn: 不断有报道称村民被强制从农村迁入城镇定居。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from force (see force)

entry.def: Forcible action involves physical force or violence.

example.ex: Reports are coming in of the forcible resettlement of villagers from the countryside into towns.
example.tran: 不断有报道称村民被强制从农村迁入城镇定居。

means.word_mean: 1. impelled by physical force especially against resistance;
